page.title: 03Old Peoples Ferrybridge (1)
page.content: There are a lot of old peoples bungalows near our school and we decided to talk to some of the people who live there.Most people said they liked living in Ferrybridge.One of the old people said she liked it very much and said it was very clean and tidy. Another said yes it's alright,I've been living here all my life.Some said they would like to se more children at church.A few wanted to stop vandals and to see less litter about.The only thing one lady wanted was her hedge cutting.This seemed the right time to be good neighbours so some of our class brought shears to cut it.A couple of people said they would like a few more seats in the park.I think this is a good idea.
